1.0.name: wordpress/wp-pirates-search
1.0.description:
Plug-in automatically interrogates the search engines to find copies of articles and blog entries from your own site. Found copyes are displayed in a list of links. You can disable the search for copies of individual articles. Found copyes can be marked as a legal copy. You can also specify sites whose pages are always going to be excluded from the search.

Default settings are sufficient for 99% of sites.

Features

  • Automatically import your settings and search results from earlier versions of the plugin;
  • Internet search of copies of your site pages;
  • Ability to start processing by CRON or automatically, without its use;
  • Searching for copies through the search engines Google and Yandex (Russian search engine);
  • Ability to specify, what pages to be excluded from processing;
  • Ability to observe that the copy is removed on foreign site;
  • Ability to mark a copy of the plagiarism for further monitoring.
